module.name: util/config/options
module.description: This module contains strategies for handling command line options and simple serialization/unserialization of ATerms. These strategies are particularly useful for writing command line tools in Stratego that may be connected into pipelines by the standard Unix piping mechanism.

strategy.name: io-wrap
strategy.description: Wraps a strategy into a strategy handling options and io of terms.
strategy.param: strategy to apply on the input term

strategy.name: io-wrap
strategy.description:
Wraps a strategy into a strategy handling options and io of terms.
use fail if you have no additional options.
strategy.param: extra options besides the default io-options
strategy to apply on the input term

strategy.name: io-wrap
strategy.description: use fail if you have no additional options.
strategy.param: extra options besides the default io-options.
strategy to apply on the input term

strategy.name: io
strategy.description:
Wraps a strategy into a strategy that handles io options.
Reads a term from the file specified by the -i option (or stdin). Writes to a file specified by the -o option (or stdout).
strategy.param: strategy to apply on the input term

strategy.name: output
strategy.description:
Wraps a strategy into a strategy that handles output options.
Writes to a file specified by the -o option (or stdout).

strategy.name: input
strategy.description:
Wraps a strategy into a strategy that handles input options.
Reads a term from the file specified by the -i option (or stdin).

strategy.name: option-wrap
strategy.description: Read options, display help, report success or failure, call strategy

strategy.name: io-options
strategy.description: Handles all common options for a transformation tool.

strategy.name: aterm-lib-options
strategy.description: Allow all flag starting with -at-* (these are ATerm library flags)

strategy.name: keep-option
strategy.description: Option specifcation for level of keeping intermediate results.

strategy.name: statistics-option
strategy.description: Option specifcation for level of statistics printing

strategy.name: input-option
strategy.description:
Option specifications for reading input.
Defines -i.

strategy.name: output-option
strategy.description:
Option specifications for writing output.
Defines -o.

strategy.name: aterm-output-option
strategy.description:
Option specifications for ATerm output.
Defines -b option for binary output.

strategy.name: verbose-option
strategy.description:
Option specifications for verbosity.
Defines -S, --silent, --verbose and -s.

strategy.name: report-failure
strategy.description:
Report the failure of this program. Must be applied to a list of strings obtained by calling the SSL_stacktrace_get_all_frame_names directly after the failure occurred (without any intervening calls to any rules/strategies).
The exit strategy to use, e.g., xtc-exit.

strategy.name: report-failure-no-trace
strategy.description: Report the failure of this program, without showing a stack trace.
